channel.title: Client ingame clickable buttons help
channel.description:
Ok so i have made a small ingame high score menu with buttons to click to change the skill you want to view high scores for. You access this menu when you press an Fkey - I already have the menu implimented and it works but the buttons are only drawn and are not clickable - nor are the actions defined as to what would do if clicked.
As i haven't done much client work before i was wondering where i would make the buttons clickable and the actions it does when its clicked - i think its all done in the mudclient but am unsure - also will i need to change anything server side or can this all be done client side.
Thanks for looking :D

item.title: Client ingame clickable buttons help
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

Thanks for the help i got it working just trying to add in the logo’s for the stat types - Also going to look into adding a menu like PeeKay have got for points but i think im going to use the abuse button instead of creating the new menu as so not to copy their layout and it makes it easier to use.

Once again thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Client ingame clickable buttons help
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Basically, the client searches for a predefined area and looks to see if any mouse clicked is in the defined area.

Here is an example:

if (super.lastMouseDownButton != 0 && super.mouseX >= 543 && super.mouseX <= 465 && super.mouseY >= 200 && super.mouseY <= 160) { // handle what happenes when you click within the area }

The code above will search to see if any mouse button is clicked when mouse coords are 543>= x <=465 and 200>= y <=160.

Read full topic
